description:
In the conventional residences, our single and double rooms are furnished with a single bed, desk/chair, bookshelf, and an armoire for each guest. These residences have separate men’s and women’s washrooms on each floor. The conventional residences are not air-conditioned.

Amenities

  • Towels included
  • Light housekeeping services daily
  • Clean linen provided every 3 days
  • Common kitchen area with stoves
  • Laundry room
  • Note: Kitchenware is not supplied

DAILY RATES

  • Single: $35/night
  • Double: $70/night
label: residence, on-campus
name: Traditional residence
